points_of_interest.name: Besieged Encampment
points_of_interest.description: A small clearing immediately outside of Clearfell Encampment, where The Bloated Miller is encountered.

npcs.name: Renly
npcs.role: Weapons and Armour vendor

npcs.name: Una
npcs.role: Caster vendor; disenchants items

npcs.name: Finn
npcs.role: Gambler

npcs.name: The Hooded One
npcs.role: Identifies items; refunds passive skills for gold, unlocked after completing 'The Mysterious Shade'

npcs.name: Leitis
npcs.role: NPC (unlocked after completing 'The Trail of Corruption')

interactables.name: Well
interactables.description: Restores life, mana, and flask/charm charges

interactables.name: Salvage Bench
interactables.description: Salvage equipment with quality or rune sockets for currency (unlocked after 'Finding the Forge')

points_of_interest.name: Frostblood Ritual
points_of_interest.description: An elevated snowy hill with log piles and a bloody ritual sigil, littered with Rotten Wolf corpses. Beira of the Rotten Pack is fought here and drops the unique Head of the Winter Wolf. (+10 Cold Res)

points_of_interest.name: Mysterious Campsite
points_of_interest.description: An abandoned campsite guarded by Rotting Guards. Contains an Abandoned Stash and a Level 1 Uncut Skill Gem.

points_of_interest.name: Vile Nest
points_of_interest.description: A large cavern chamber where The Devourer is encountered. The Devourer drops an Uncut Skill Gem (Level 2).

points_of_interest.name: Hatchery
points_of_interest.description: An area with several egg sacs that can be broken open.

points_of_interest.name: Woodman's Locker
points_of_interest.description: Clusters of magic chests found in larger clearings.

points_of_interest.name: The Moving Bramble
points_of_interest.description: A thorn-vine-surrounded clearing where The Brambleghast is fought. It drops an Uncut Skill Gem (Level 2).

points_of_interest.name: Areagne's Hut
points_of_interest.description: A small hut containing a Cauldron chest with flasks. On exiting, the rare monster Areagne, Forgotten Witch ambushes the player. Defeating her yields an Uncut Support Gem (Level 1).

points_of_interest.name: Tree of Souls
points_of_interest.description: A large sealed tree to which The Hooded One is bound. Requires collecting Runed Spikes to break the seals.

points_of_interest.name: Obelisk of Rust
points_of_interest.description: Three ancient obelisks scattered in the vale. Activating them summons packs of Ancient Ezomytes. The third obelisk spawns The Rust King boss, who drops the Runed Skull Cap quest item and a Level 3 Uncut Skill Gem.

points_of_interest.name: Abandoned Stash
points_of_interest.description: Arms caches (chests) found throughout the area containing various low-level martial weapons.

points_of_interest.name: Den of the Druid
points_of_interest.description: A circular cavern with regenerating explosive mushrooms. The Rotten Druid resides here and drops an Uncut Support Gem (Level 1).

points_of_interest.name: Memorial of the Lost
points_of_interest.description: A courtyard with a large memorial statue where Lachlann of Endless Lament is fought. Defeating him yields an Uncut Skill Gem (Level 3).

points_of_interest.name: Ancient Ruin
points_of_interest.description: A ruined section containing two lore items and a sarcophagus chest (contains a normal ring).

points_of_interest.name: Heart of the Mausoleum
points_of_interest.description: A rectangular central chamber where Draven, the Eternal Praetor (boss) emerges from a pit.

points_of_interest.name: Forgotten Riches
points_of_interest.description: A hidden treasure room containing piles of gold and two rare chests. Accessed by activating a concealed switch on a pillar.

points_of_interest.name: Heart of the Tomb
points_of_interest.description: A rectangular burial chamber where Asinia, the Praetor's Consort, appears from a central pit.

points_of_interest.name: Haunted Treasure
points_of_interest.description: A special chest guarded by a ghost. Approaching it spawns Risen Rattlers and a rare Eternal Knight, which drops an Uncut Support Gem (Level 1).

points_of_interest.name: The Hunt Stone
points_of_interest.description: A path lined with wooden structures and a giant bell, leading to a stone monument. The Crowbell boss patrols this path, ringing the bell as it moves to its arena.

points_of_interest.name: Dryadic Ritual
points_of_interest.description: Three Skeleton Spriggans performing a ritual that summons a rare Cultivated Grove enemy. Defeating it yields an Uncut Support Gem (Level 1).

points_of_interest.name: Ritual Altar
points_of_interest.description: A single Ritual altar located near the center. Completing this ritual (after the others) spawns 'Ominous Altars' quest progression and grants a Level 4 Uncut Skill Gem.

points_of_interest.name: Unnamed Ritual
points_of_interest.description: A central circular ritual area unlocked after completing three Ritual events in the zone. Completing the final ritual spawns The King in the Mists. Ritual Tribute can be spent at the altar for rewards.

points_of_interest.name: Crop Circle
points_of_interest.description: A circular field where packs of Rabid Dogs and a rare Rabid Dog (Vargir the Feral Mutt) spawn. Vargir drops an Uncut Skill Gem (Level 4).

points_of_interest.name: Una's Home
points_of_interest.description: A hut containing Una's Lute Box. Looting Una's Lute triggers the quest 'The Lost Lute'. Returning this item to Una in Clearfell Encampment unlocks the town's Salvage Bench.

points_of_interest.name: Executioner's Block
points_of_interest.description: A broad plaza in front of a wooden gallows platform. This is where The Executioner is fought, dropping an Uncut Support Gem (Level 1).

points_of_interest.name: Renly's Workshop
points_of_interest.description: A workshop containing Renly's Smithing Tools. Taking these triggers the quest 'Finding the Forge'; returning them to Renly in Act 1 town unlocks the Salvage Bench feature.

points_of_interest.name: The Gallows
points_of_interest.description: A hanging scaffold with a corpse. Interacting with the noose rope causes a Level 1 Uncut Support Gem to drop from the hanged man's body.

points_of_interest.name: Throne of the Wolf
points_of_interest.description: The final arena on the bottom floor where Count Geonor is fought.

points_of_interest.name: Grotesque Altar
points_of_interest.description: An altar on the first floor. Interacting with the Psalm of Madness here summons Candlemass, the Living Rite. Defeating Candlemass awards Candlemass' Essence (+20 max life).

points_of_interest.name: Raider's Cliffs
points_of_interest.description: Hyena Demons will constantly spawn and non-targetable Sun Clan Scavengers will continuously pelt the player with spears when approaching the cliff to face Rathbreaker. Once Rathbreaker is defeated, all spawned Hyena Demons and Sun Clan Scavengers will run towards or jump into the arena in an ambush.

points_of_interest.name: Raided Camp
points_of_interest.description: A small camp that contains several piles of gold, a few lootable corpses, and a rare chest.

npcs.name: Zarka
npcs.role: Vendor (caster weapons, foci, flasks, charms, jewellery; disenchants items)

npcs.name: Risu, Faridun Defector
npcs.role: Gambler (unlocked during Act 2 quest 'The Trail of Corruption')

npcs.name: The Hooded One
npcs.role: Identifies items; refunds passive skills for gold

npcs.name: Shambrin
npcs.role: Weapons vendor (martial weapons for gold)

npcs.name: Zarka
npcs.role: Caster goods vendor (caster weapons, foci, flasks, charms, jewellery; disenchants items)

npcs.name: Risu, Faridun Defector
npcs.role: Gambler (unlocked during Act 2 quest 'The Trail of Corruption')

npcs.name: The Hooded One
npcs.role: Sin in disguise – identifies items and refunds passives

npcs.name: Sekhema Asala
npcs.role: Maraketh leader of the caravan

interactables.name: Well
interactables.description: Refills life, mana, and flask/charm charges

interactables.name: Salvage Bench
interactables.description: Salvage gear with quality or rune sockets for currency (unlocked after 'Finding the Forge')

interactables.name: Desert Map
interactables.description: Navigation map used to move the caravan to new locations

points_of_interest.name: Faridun War Cache
points_of_interest.description: Contains an Artifcer's Orb

points_of_interest.name: Munitions Bunker
points_of_interest.description: Boss arena for Rudja, the Dread Engineer. Drops a Level 6 Uncut Skill Gem.

points_of_interest.name: Prison of the Disgraced
points_of_interest.description: Balbala's arena on the second floor, sealed by runic doors. Destroy three Runic Seals along the path that begins at the Decree of Imprisonment to release her.

points_of_interest.name: The Six Sisters
points_of_interest.description: Semi‑circular staircase surrounding six statues on stone pillars; a checkpoint is adjacent. The Witch has a unique line here.

points_of_interest.name: Looted Dead End
points_of_interest.description: A side dead end containing several loot piles and a checkpoint.

points_of_interest.name: Infested Tower
points_of_interest.description: Inner-most arena smothered in the Beast’s tendrils where Jamanra, the Risen King is fought.

points_of_interest.name: Forward Command Tents
points_of_interest.description: Tent encircled by impaled corpses; contains the fixed‑name rare miniboss L'im the Impaler.

points_of_interest.name: The Venom Pit
points_of_interest.description: Small sand pit arena where Kabala, Constrictor Queen is encountered.

points_of_interest.name: Abandoned Shrine
points_of_interest.description: Shrine of Hotak with piles of gold and a rare chest that drops a magic amulet.

points_of_interest.name: Looted Vault
points_of_interest.description: Looted vault with a nearby checkpoint.

points_of_interest.name: The Galleria
points_of_interest.description: Hallway patrolled by The Ninth Treasure of Keth. Defeating it drops a magic jewel.

points_of_interest.name: Golden Tomb
points_of_interest.description: Surrounded by Adorned Beetles; first loot drops a Level 7 Uncut Spirit Gem, with a checkpoint nearby.

points_of_interest.name: The Heart of Keth
points_of_interest.description: Also shown as 'Vestibule of the Rains'; square room with corner urns that create Burning Ground when broken by Azarian.

points_of_interest.name: Suspicious Sarcophagus
points_of_interest.description: Tomb of Ahkeli, the Honoured Founder; contains a Level 1 Uncut Support Gem and triggers Terracotta Soldiers.

points_of_interest.name: Elemental Offering
points_of_interest.description: Choose Fire, Water, or Lightning to receive a magic Ruby, Sapphire, or Topaz Ring.

points_of_interest.name: The Water Goddess
points_of_interest.description: Ignite Halani using the Everlasting Cinders to obtain The Essence of Water.

points_of_interest.name: Fossilised Memorial
points_of_interest.description: Bone Effigy (Shrine of Bones) that drops a Level 1 Uncut Support Gem.

points_of_interest.name: Blackrib Pit
points_of_interest.description: Circular arena near the end. Both Ekbab, Ancient Steed and Iktab, the Deathlord must be slain in the same instance to drop Mastodon Tusks.

points_of_interest.name: Ancient Seals
points_of_interest.description: Activate the three Titan seals (Rajendra, Sundari, Shakti) to open the Clasped Entry.

points_of_interest.name: The Clasped Entry
points_of_interest.description: Sealed doorway leading to The Titan Grotto.

points_of_interest.name: Medallion (Offering to Amrit)
points_of_interest.description: Socket the Kabala and Sun Clan Relics to choose a permanent bonus: 30% increased Charm Charges gained or 15% increased Mana Recovery from Flasks (Life Recovery in Cruel).

points_of_interest.name: Dais of Reckoning
points_of_interest.description: Circular arena where Zalmarath, the Colossus is fought; parts of the arena can be broken off during the fight.

points_of_interest.name: Forgotten Corpses / The Wretched Sluice
points_of_interest.description: Also marked as Watchful Twins on the world map; defeat the two vultures to (first time) drop a Djinn Barya.

points_of_interest.name: Fallen Dekhara
points_of_interest.description: Drops the Final Letter for the optional quest Tradition's Toll.

points_of_interest.name: The Forgotten Hollow
points_of_interest.description: Contains an Artificer's Orb.

points_of_interest.name: Abandoned Rhoa
points_of_interest.description: Interactive object at the entrance; also triggers Tradition's Toll.

points_of_interest.name: Hushed Urn
points_of_interest.description: Also shown as Shifting Vases on the world map; spawns Urnwalkers and drops a Level 8 Uncut Skill Gem.

points_of_interest.name: The Defiled Spire
points_of_interest.description: Ring-like rooftop arena with a central hole; Tor Gul, the Defiler is encountered here.

points_of_interest.name: Sisters of Garukhan
points_of_interest.description: Grants a permanent +10% Lightning Resistance and spawns Kinarha statues.

points_of_interest.name: Testament of Defiance
points_of_interest.description: Lore text near the Sisters of Garukhan shrine.

points_of_interest.name: Bridgehead Ambush
points_of_interest.description: A guaranteed magic monster pack appears just before the final checkpoint leading into Dreadnought Vanguard.

points_of_interest.name: The Faridun Throne
points_of_interest.description: Small saddle-top arena on the Dreadnought where Jamanra, the Abomination is fought.

points_of_interest.name: Foul Ritual
points_of_interest.description: Ritual site where Rootdredge is encountered; drops a Level 9 Uncut Skill Gem.

points_of_interest.name: Orok Campfire
points_of_interest.description: Small Orok (Azak) settlement with a chest that drops a Lesser Jeweller's Orb.

points_of_interest.name: Hanging Tree
points_of_interest.description: Nearby corpse contains a magic ring.

points_of_interest.name: Expedition Logbook
points_of_interest.description: Lore object found at the entrance to the area.

npcs.name: Zarka
npcs.role: Sells caster weapons, foci, flasks, charms, and jewellery; disenchants items for currency shards.

npcs.name: The Hooded One
npcs.role: Identify inventory; refund passives skills for gold.

points_of_interest.name: Waypoint
points_of_interest.description: Teleport to other discovered waypoints.

points_of_interest.name: Well
points_of_interest.description: Restores life, mana, and flask and charm charges.

points_of_interest.name: Salvage Bench
points_of_interest.description: Unlocked after completing Finding the Forge; salvages equipment with quality or rune sockets for currency.

points_of_interest.name: Time Portal
points_of_interest.description: Unlocked during Legacy of the Vaal; travel to the past (400 BIC, the peak of Atziri's reign).

points_of_interest.name: Oswald's Death Journal
points_of_interest.description: A readable lore object.

npcs.name: Oswald
npcs.role: Sells martial weapons; vendors items for gold.

npcs.name: Servi
npcs.role: Sells caster weapons, foci, flasks, charms, and jewellery; disenchants items for currency shards.

npcs.name: Alva
npcs.role: Gambler; vendors items for gold.

npcs.name: The Hooded One
npcs.role: Identify inventory; refund passive skill points for gold.

npcs.name: Doryani
npcs.role: Appears after completing Legacy of the Vaal.

points_of_interest.name: Temple Ruins
points_of_interest.description: Small clearing ringed by broken pillars.

points_of_interest.name: Jungle Grave
points_of_interest.description: Summon Servi here to receive a rare Rawhide Belt or Linen Belt.

points_of_interest.name: Troubled Camp
points_of_interest.description: Gwendolyn Albright appears here as a vendor.

points_of_interest.name: Expedition Logbook
points_of_interest.description: Found at the Jungle Grave.

npcs.name: Gwendolyn Albright
npcs.role: Vendor.

points_of_interest.name: Priesthood Crypt
points_of_interest.description: Contains several sarcophagus chests of random rarity.

points_of_interest.name: Den of the Serpent Priestess
points_of_interest.description: A corpse here holds Corpse-snake Venom.

points_of_interest.name: Larva Hollow
points_of_interest.description: A small cave containing several bugs.

points_of_interest.name: Canal Mechanism
points_of_interest.description: Used to drain the entrance to The Matlan Waterways. Requires a Large Soul Core.

points_of_interest.name: Troubled Camp
points_of_interest.description: Small camp where Sebastian Carroway (vendor) appears.

npcs.name: Sebastian Carroway
npcs.role: Vendor at the Troubled Camp.

points_of_interest.name: Gor-gor Mog
points_of_interest.description: Large circular arena at the far end of the zone. Ignagduk, the Bog Witch drops Gemrot Skull and Ignagduk's Ghastly Spear.

points_of_interest.name: Flameskin Ritual
points_of_interest.description: Ritual site ringed by five Small Effigies. Lighting all five and approaching the central effigy grants Ignagduk's Harvest: +25% Fire Resistance and 25% increased item rarity for the rest of the instance; can be reacquired if lost.

points_of_interest.name: Deadly Nest
points_of_interest.description: Entrance to the Machinarium. Xyclucian can land on one of three destructible pillars. Drops a Level 9 Uncut Skill Gem and a Chimeral Inscribed Ultimatum (take to the Temple of Chaos for a Trial of Chaos). In Cruel, the quest version Inscribed Ultimatum does not drop.

points_of_interest.name: Toxic Bloom
points_of_interest.description: Several flowers create pools of Caustic Ground. The boss drops a magic amulet.

points_of_interest.name: Ravaged Camp
points_of_interest.description: Contains two magic chests and one rare chest.

npcs.name: The Trialmaster
npcs.role: Final optional boss of the Trial of Chaos. Appears after using three Fates to unlock the door; drops exclusive uniques and corrupted Inscribed Ultimatums with wager modifiers.

points_of_interest.name: The Oubliette
points_of_interest.description: Small arena with four stone pillars. Requires a Small Soul Core to access.

points_of_interest.name: Supply Room
points_of_interest.description: Stacks of Gold and three rare chests. Requires a Small Soul Core to access.

points_of_interest.name: Grand Soul Core Nexus
points_of_interest.description: Large mural containing the Large Soul Core. Drops the Large Soul Core and a Level 10 Uncut Spirit Gem.

points_of_interest.name: Generator
points_of_interest.description: Two generators found in the far corners; each requires a Medium Soul Core found in the area.

points_of_interest.name: Paquate's Mechanism
points_of_interest.description: Corruption Altar that applies a Vaal Orb effect to an item.

points_of_interest.name: Shaman's Hut
points_of_interest.description: A small hut along the path; drops a random rare item.

points_of_interest.name: Canal Lever
points_of_interest.description: Used to drain Utzaal and open access to the Temple of Kopec and The Drowned City from Ziggurat Encampment.

points_of_interest.name: Swarming Nest
points_of_interest.description: Spawns packs of magic Drowned Crawlers.

points_of_interest.name: Shinies
points_of_interest.description: An indoor area containing several piles of Gold.

points_of_interest.name: The Aureaduct
points_of_interest.description: Large molten-gold spillway that begins moving during the fight; molten gold damages on contact and empowers Mektul. Reaching the end of the aureaduct is a failstate.

points_of_interest.name: Stenchpools
points_of_interest.description: Small arena with a filthy fountain where the Queen of Filth is fought. Drops the Temple Door Idol.

points_of_interest.name: Bubbling Respite
points_of_interest.description: Next to Cauldron Keeper. Throw a Red, Green, and Blue Mushroom into the cauldron to receive quality Gargantuan Life and Mana Flasks.

points_of_interest.name: Ancient Carving
points_of_interest.description: Lore tablet at the entrance from The Drowned City.

npcs.name: Cauldron Keeper
npcs.role: Sells caster weapons, foci, flasks, charms, and jewellery; vendors items for gold.

Act3.name: Temple of Kopec

points_of_interest.name: Altar of the Sun
points_of_interest.description: Circular arena at the peak of the temple surrounded by solar flares. Drops a Level 11 Uncut Skill Gem.

monsters: Ketzuli, High Priest of the Sun

points_of_interest.name: Legion Blockade
points_of_interest.description: Viper Napuatzi blocks the central road with Viper Legionnaires. Defeating him causes the remaining legionnaires to break formation and attack. Drops a Level 2 Uncut Support Gem.

points_of_interest.name: Trialmaster's Challenge
points_of_interest.description: Take an Ultimatum Key from the Trialmaster statue for an area level 43 Inscribed Ultimatum; bring it to the Temple of Chaos to attempt a Trial of Chaos.

points_of_interest.name: Peculiar Fortunes
points_of_interest.description: Three sub-areas containing idols that can be sold to Oswald in Ziggurat Encampment. Uromoti's and Napuatzi's Quarters usually spawn near the Ziggurat Encampment side; Azcapa's Quarters usually spawns toward the Aggorat side.

points_of_interest.name: Uromoti's Quarters
points_of_interest.description: Piles of Gold and several chests; contains a Glorious Idol that vendors for 1500 Gold.

points_of_interest.name: Napuatzi's Quarters
points_of_interest.description: Piles of Gold and several chests; contains a Golden Idol that vendors for 500 Gold.

points_of_interest.name: Azcapa's Quarters
points_of_interest.description: Several chests and breakable urns; contains a Grand Idol that vendors for 1000 Gold.

points_of_interest.name: Blood Sacrifice
points_of_interest.description: Place the Sacrificial Heart on the Sacrificial Altar, then stab it with the Sacrificial Dagger to gain 2 passive skill points and 2 weapon set passive skill points.

points_of_interest.name: Rejoice!
points_of_interest.description: Lore tablet found at the end of the flower-decorated first half of the area.

points_of_interest.name: The Testing Pit
points_of_interest.description: Large circular arena ringed by laser ports.
